trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBSEA065_00477_SEQ_00<tab>Weitzaren, high miller of the Grey Fleet, requires the help of an able adventurer.
TEXT_SUBSEA065_00477_SEQ_01<tab>Weitzaren asks that you wreak vengeance on the galagos that robbed him of his milled grains, and recover the sacks of flour they stole.
TEXT_SUBSEA065_00477_SEQ_02<tab>You have delivered swift retribution to the thieving galagos. Take the recovered flour to Skarnmhar at the Red Rooster Stead.
TEXT_SUBSEA065_00477_SEQ_03<tab>Skarnmhar is appreciative of your help, but bemoans the fact the Stead hires no guards, and he must rely on the kindness of adventurers when things go awry.
TEXT_SUBSEA065_00477_TODO_00<tab>Defeat the galagos and recover the sacks of flour.
TEXT_SUBSEA065_00477_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the sacks of flour to Skarnmhar.
TEXT_SUBSEA065_00477_WEITZAREN_000_0<tab>Now, felting wool is all well and good for your run-of-the-mill miller, but you know what gets my grindstone spinning? Grain!
TEXT_SUBSEA065_00477_WEITZAREN_000_1<tab>What worth has wheat? None! But once shred into fabulous flour, even the confounded galagos can't keep their hands off of it.
TEXT_SUBSEA065_00477_WEITZAREN_000_2<tab>Which is precisely why I need you to slay them and recover the four sacks they pilfered!
TEXT_SUBSEA065_00477_WEITZAREN_000_3<tab>Once you have done so, take the sacks of flour down to the Stead, and Skarnmhar will take care of the rest.
TEXT_SUBSEA065_00477_SKARNMHAR_000_10<tab>All the eggs and milk in the world don't matter a lick without flour.
TEXT_SUBSEA065_00477_SKARNMHAR_000_11<tab>Not that flour's any good on its own, mind you. The galagos just hoard whatever they can get their filthy paws on.
TEXT_SUBSEA065_00477_SKARNMHAR_000_12<tab>But now we've got the whole kit and caboodle, thanks to you.
TEXT_SUBSEA065_00477_SKARNMHAR_000_13<tab>It's a relief you were around, but at the end of the day we're still utterly unprepared should this sort of thing happen again.
